name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by turbo_ninja, gothfae, GeyserShitdick, anticitizen, mortshire, equinn2006, TheLoneliestMonkey, NDCaesar, Sweetlips, luckypyjamas, nipsy43, lk, fakedaisies, aHatOfPig, werthog42, suprememongoose, nutmeg, hellofditties, empy, alejandroadam, Wite_Rabit, Doc_Rostov, Panserbjorne)

name: alejandroadam
text: A comment left by alejandroadam was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hellofyellin, Overmedicated, gothfae, godfatherofsouls, lk, empy, Wite_Rabit, Footbullet, henrythecad, fortunagolde)

name: madrin
text:
uh P.S oasis suck.
come on, they actually do.

name: rotating-dog
text: A comment left by rotating-dog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by gothfae, anticitizen, equinn2006, lk, werthog42, Wite_Rabit, henrythecad)

name: xiaomimi
text: If Lyle was English, maybe, but this strip describes pretty accurately the impression Oasis made on American pop culture.

name: rotating-dog
text: An American friend has since informed me how Oasis are percieved in the U.S. You are right.

name: idsyen
text: Can I inquire as to how Oasis are perceived in England?

name: gmm
text:
If you are an idiot in England, you say: "Aw yeah Oasis are the best band evar, they're well good they are, they've got massive choons you can proper sing along to"

If you are not, you say: "Making bad music is one thing, but Oasis actively promote stupidity. And make REALLY bad music." Or similar.

Sadly, they remain VERY popular despite being absolutely godawful

name: clintisiceman
text:
I had the most infuriating argument with an English kid who thought Oasis was the best band in the world, but the only reason he could come up with was that they were really popular and that few of the bands I loved were anywhere near as popular.

Seriously, stealing lines from Wonderwall to talk to your crush in 6th grade was cool, but what the Christ, man.

name: tekende
text:
Look, I know it's cool to hate on Oasis. And I'll grant you, the majority of their career warrants it.

But come on. Oasis's first two albums were legitimately very good. Everything after that was middling to awful, until their most recent release which was actually, much to my shock, very very good. It's like Oasis has finally woken up to the fact that it's not 1994 anymore.

name: johnny_diamond
text: A comment left by johnny_diamond was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mashisoyo, shrewbie, jay_wish)

name: anticitizen
text:
nah the Beatles were Liverpool, Oasis was Manchester.

So were the Smiths.

Blur was the posher side of London, though Damon grew up in Whitechapel (as in Jack the Ripper shit).

and this, ladies and gentlemen is why i didn't get laid in high school.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Nah, you can respect Lyle. Also, Oasis are hardly a rock band.

name: turbo_ninja
text: This is the first signed strip I owned.  I own it because it is AWESOME.

name: daklin
text: Every time I read this I lose a year from my life cause I laugh too hard.

name: ssddr
text: The concept of using a band to do your gardening is enough, but the execution makes it fantastic.

name: padijun
text: Who wouldn't pay a few hundred dollars for the chance to hit the gallaghers in the balls with a rolled up painting of America? Hell most people would pay a couple thousand.

name: cdl146
text: Lyle is so disappointed that he won Oasis.

name: johnnylandmine
text: Voted five, not because I particularly think it's a Five, but to counteract the haters. C'mon, now.

name: evolume
text: I think actually Oasis' accents are heavier than this.  I've seen them subtitled on television interviews before.

name: choosebro
text: That's not saying much. I've seen clear, Australian accents subtitled on American TV.

name: jollysaintpete
text: are you sure there weren't deaf people in the room

name: choosebro
text: I can't be sure. I'm blind to deaf people.

name: hawaiian_robot
text:
"Yeah nah them fuckin deaf cunts can get fucked aye"

My impression of my country's accent, people.

name: ashoykh
text: Come an' get one in the yarbles...if ya have any yarbles...you eunuch jelly

name: pebohead
text: OH SHIIIIIIIIIIIT!  I just raised this bastard to a 4.0

name: cailetshadow
text: Is Oasis 2 feet tall?

name: heyman
text: no, they are reaching up to a high up window occupied by lyle

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shenred, Deusoma, mashisoyo, Cracklewater, EndlessMike, theplaidknight, hellofditties, Wite_Rabit, jonnylatron, AmonRunsAmok)

name: hellofditties
text: I only just realised that Lyle is looking into a pepsi cap in panel one and two.  And now that I know Lyle is drinking pepsi, I want to know what Teodore has in his cup.  I need closure.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: half and half. he is yet to gain much weight.

name: crankheart
text: <3 <3 <3 this arc

name: mikeronomicon
text: Oasis needs to get kicked in the stones more. Fuck Oasis.

name: changuitotuerto
text: People exist who legitimately believe that Oasis is a better band than Radiohead. At least one of these people is in the Hold Steady, an american band just as awful as Oasis.

name: dj_douche
text: One good song. ONE song people - "Whatever." You will not find a better organ riff than in Whatever. But it was the single that placed them on the charts and paved the way for the crap that was Wonderwall, Don't Look Back In Anger etc. Totally not worth it.

name: tekende
text: Man "Whatever" really is such a great song. I think even someone who hates Oasis could like that song.

name: shirt145
text: Listen, I know I'm not on the popular side here, but hear me out.  Oasis is kickass.  What more do we want from our rock stars than yelling at each other, swearing, getting arrested, and general cocky shitbaggery?  They are a mumbling train wreck you can't help but watch.  And dammit, I like their fooking music. I got my heebie jeebies in a hidden bag? Hell of rad.

name: dickie_roxx
text: I am not a fan of Oasis but I am a fan of Amanda Fucking Palmer .

name: highfeverblues
text: Great Scots!

name: sevenslashfour
text: 5/5 for "yarbles."

name: heccibiggs
text: And now they are broken up.
